abstract: Companies are now moving toward applications where performance, heat resistance and durability are more important.
snippet: Companies are now moving toward applications where performance, heat resistance and durability are more important.
lead_paragraph: MEG SOBKOWICZ was on a fast career track in the oil industry. A bachelor’s degree in chemical engineering from Columbia landed her a job at Schlumberger running wireline logs on oil wells in New Mexico. Next stop was to be Casper, Wyo., the heart of the interior West’s oil and gas boom. But she jumped off the track.

headline.main: The New Bioplastics, More Than Just Forks
headline.print_headline: The New Bioplastics, More Than Just Forks
